message: Let's get this done quickly Bob, this inflation is no joke!  Take this generous offer and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm offering a more equitable split.  Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share as well!
Bob, time is running out!  I'm offering you a fair deal before inflation takes another chunk out of your potential earnings.  Let's be sensible and end this.
Alice, this is my final offer. It's a fair split considering the time pressure and inflation.  Agree now, or we both risk losing out even more.
